entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
